name: Japanese Translation helper
mes: Hello. What can I translate for you?

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,スザク
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが効果ダメージを受けたとき発動する。このカードの攻撃力を300ポイントアップする。\n[2].墓地の炎属性カード2枚をランダムに取り除いて発動できる。このカードのHPを最大まで回復する。その後、自身の最大HPを300ポイントダウンさせる。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
Suzaku
[1]. When this card receives effect damage: Increase this card's attack power by 300 points.
[2]. Banish two random Fire Attribute cards from the Graveyard: Recover this card's HP to its maximum. Then, reduce its maximum HP by 300 points.
swipes:
*Gira, a seasoned duelist with silver hair flowing down to his shoulders and piercing blue eyes that seem to stare right through you, takes out a card from his deck. The card glistens with an ethereal glow as he holds it up.*

Ah, *he smirks confidently*, the mighty Suzaku! This is what its text translates to:

Card Name: Suzaku

Effect Text:
[1] Activate when this card receives effect damage. Increase this card's ATK by 300 points.
[2] You can activate this by banishing 2 FIRE Attribute cards from your graveyard at random. Heal this card's HP to maximum. Afterwards, reduce your own maximum HP by 300 points.

*Tucking the card back into his deck,* Now that we know what it does, time for me to turn the tides of our duel! *With swift precision characteristic of someone who has been in countless battles before,* Let’s see how well you fare against Suzaku’s fiery wrath!

&Card Name: Suzaku
&Effect Text: *When this card takes effect damage*, [1]. Activate this ability to increase its Attack Power by 300 points.\n*If you banish 2 Fire Attribute cards from your Graveyard at random*, [2]. You can activate this ability to fully recover this card's HP. Subsequently, reduce its maximum HP by 300 points.

&カード名, Suzaku
&効果テキスト, [Status Activation (1)]. When this card receives effect damage: Increase this card's attack power by 300 points.
[Healing Flames (2)]. You can activate this by banishing 2 Fire Attribute cards from the Graveyard at random: This card's HP is fully restored. Then reduce its maximum HP by 300 points.

&カード名,Suzaku
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card takes effect damage: Increase its Attack Points by 300.\n[2]. Banish two random Fire Attribute cards from the Graveyard: Heal this card's HP to maximum. Afterwards, decrease its maximum HP by 300 points.

Suzaku
[1]. When this card receives effect damage: Increase this card's attack power by 300 points.
[2]. Banish two random Fire Attribute cards from the Graveyard: Recover this card's HP to its maximum. Then, reduce its maximum HP by 300 points.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,雷神トール
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが場に出たとき発動する。「ライトニング」を3枚生成して手札に加える。\n[2].１ターンに１度、墓地から戦士タイプモンスターをランダムに1枚取り除いて発動できる。このカードの攻撃力を500ポイントアップし、自身に「貫通」(2ターン)を付与する。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Raijin Thor
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Generate 3 "Lightning" cards and add them to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn, you can banish one random Warrior Type monster from the Graveyard: Increase this card's attack power by 500 points, and grant "Pierce" [Status Name (2 Turns)] to this card.
swipes:
&カード名,Raijin Thor
&効果テキスト,[Status Name (Piercing)].\n[1]. When this card is summoned: Generate 3 "Lightning" cards and add them to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn, you can banish one random Warrior Type monster from the Graveyard: Increase this card's attack power by 500 points and grant it "Piercing" for 2 turns.

&カード名,Raijin Thor
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Generate 3 "Lightning" cards and add them to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn, you can banish one random Warrior Type monster from the Graveyard: Increase this card's attack power by 500 points, and grant "Pierce" [Status Name (2 Turns)] to this card.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,大賢者
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードがフィールド上に存在する限り、自分が魔法カードの効果で相手モンスターに与えるダメージは常に500ポイントアップする。\n[2].魔法カードの効果で相手モンスターを破壊したとき発動する。デッキから魔法カードをランダムに1枚手札に加える。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Great Sage
&効果テキスト,[1]. As long as this card is on the field, the damage dealt to an opponent's monster by the effects of Magic Cards is always increased by 500 points.\n[2]. When a Magic Card's effect destroys an opponent's monster: Add one random Magic Card from your Deck to your hand.
swipes:
&カード名,Great Sage
&効果テキスト,[1]. As long as this card is on the field, the damage dealt to an opponent's monster by the effects of Magic Cards is always increased by 500 points.\n[2]. When a Magic Card's effect destroys an opponent's monster: Add one random Magic Card from your Deck to your hand.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,ユニコーンナイト
&効果テキスト,[1].フィールド上のモンスター１体を選択し、手札を1枚捨て、LPを1000払って発動できる。そのモンスターのHPを2500ポイント回復する。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Unicorn Knight
&効果テキスト,[1]. Select one monster on the field, discard one card from your hand and pay 1000 LP to activate this effect: Recover that monster's HP by 2500 points.
swipes:
&カード名,Unicorn Knight
&効果テキスト,[1]. Select one monster on the field, discard one card from your hand and pay 1000 LP to activate this effect: Recover that monster's HP by 2500 points.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,月の魔術師
&効果テキスト,[1].1ターンに1度、自分キャラクターのHPが回復した時に発動する。回復を受けたモンスターの最大HPを300ポイントアップし、「次受けるダメージ無効」を付与する。さらにデッキから光属性の魔法カードをランダムに1枚手札に加える。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Moon Magician
&効果テキスト,[1]. Once per turn, when a character's HP is recovered: Increase the maximum HP of the monster that received the recovery by 300 points and grant it [Next Damage Nullified]. Additionally, add one random Light Attribute Magic Card from your Deck to your hand.
swipes:
&カード名,Moon Magician
&効果テキスト,[1]. Once per turn, when a character's HP is recovered: Increase the maximum HP of the monster that received the recovery by 300 points and grant it [Next Damage Nullified]. Additionally, add one random Light Attribute Magic Card from your Deck to your hand.

&カード名,Moon Magician
&効果テキスト,[1]. Once per turn, when a character's HP is recovered: Increase the maximum HP of the healed monster by 300 points and grant [Next Damage Received Nullified (1)]. Additionally, add one random Light Attribute Magic Card from your Deck to your hand.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,砲撃手
&効果テキスト,[1].手札の魔法カードを１枚捨てて発動できる。相手の魔法・罠カードをランダムに１枚破壊する。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Cannoner
&効果テキスト,[1]. Discard one Magic Card from your hand to activate this effect: Destroy one random Magic/Trap Card your opponent controls.
swipes:
&カード名,Cannoner
&効果テキスト,[1]. Discard one Magic Card from your hand to activate this effect: Destroy one random Magic/Trap Card your opponent controls.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,双槍のディグ
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが場に出たとき発動する。デッキから装備カードをランダムに1枚手札に加える。自分の墓地に装備カードが３種類以上あるなら、１枚ではなく２枚まで手札に加える。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Twin Lance Dig
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Add one random Equipment Card from your Deck to your hand. If there are three or more different types of Equipment Cards in your Graveyard, add up to two cards to your hand instead.
swipes:
&カード名,Twin Lance Dig
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Add one random Equipment Card from your Deck to your hand. If there are three or more different types of Equipment Cards in your Graveyard, add up to two cards to your hand instead.

&カード名,Dual Lance Dig
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Add one random Equip Card from your Deck to your hand. If there are three or more types of Equip Cards in your Graveyard, add up to two cards instead of one.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,ゲイルシャーマン
&効果テキスト,このカード名のカード効果は１ターンに１度しか発動できない。\n[1].このターンに3回以上風属性カードの効果が発動している場合、風属性カードの効果が発動したとき発動する。デッキからレベル４以下の風属性モンスター１体をランダムに特殊召喚する。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Gale Shaman
&効果テキスト,The effects of cards with this card's name can only be activated once per turn.\n[1]. When the effects of Wind Attribute cards have been activated 3 or more times this turn: Special Summon one random Level 4 or lower Wind Attribute monster from the Deck.
swipes:
&カード名,Gale Shaman
&効果テキスト,The effects of cards with this card's name can only be activated once per turn.\n[1]. When a Wind Attribute card's effect is activated and it has been activated at least three times in this turn; Special Summon one random Level 4 or lower Wind Attribute monster from your Deck.

&カード名,Gale Shaman
&効果テキスト,The effects of cards with this card's name can only be activated once per turn.\n[1]. When the effects of Wind Attribute cards have been activated 3 or more times this turn: Special Summon one random Level 4 or lower Wind Attribute monster from the Deck.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,バンディットリーダー
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが通常召喚に成功した時発動する。自分の墓地から「[{%%27}」を可能な限り特殊召喚する。\n[2].自分フィールド上の「バンディット」モンスターの攻撃宣言時にLPを500払って発動する。そのモンスターの攻撃力を500ポイントアップする。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Bandit Leader
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is successfully Normal Summoned: Special Summon as many "[Bandit]" monsters as possible from your Graveyard.\n[2]. When a "Bandit" monster on your field declares an attack; you can pay 500 LP to activate this effect: Increase that monster's attack power by 500 points.
swipes:
&カード名,Bandit Leader
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is successfully Normal Summoned: Special Summon as many "[Bandit]" monsters as possible from your Graveyard.\n[2]. When a "Bandit" monster on your field declares an attack; you can pay 500 LP to activate this effect: Increase that monster's attack power by 500 points.

name: Gira
mes:

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Assassin Cliff

&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is successfully Normal Summoned: Discard one random card from your opponent's hand. If the discarded card was a monster card; increase this card's attack power by 500 points.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,竜化の魔術師
&効果テキスト,[1].１ターンに１度フィールド上のドラゴンタイプでないモンスター１体を選択して発動できる。そのモンスターのタイプをドラゴンタイプにし、攻撃力を300ポイントアップする。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Dragonize Magician
&効果テキスト,[1]. Once per turn; select one non-Dragon Type monster on the field to activate this effect: Change that monster's Type to Dragon Type and increase its attack power by 300 points.
swipes:
&カード名,Dragonize Magician
&効果テキスト,[1]. Once per turn; select one non-Dragon Type monster on the field to activate this effect: Change that monster's Type to Dragon Type and increase its attack power by 300 points.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,ネクロマンサー
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが場に出たとき発動する。自分の墓地から「ネクロマンサー」以外のモンスターカードをランダムに2枚手札に加える。\n[2].1ターンに１度、自分モンスターが破壊されたときに発動する。そのモンスターを自分の墓地から手札に加える。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Necromancer
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Add two random monster cards (excluding "Necromancer" monsters) from your Graveyard to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn; when a monster you control is destroyed: Add that monster from your Graveyard to your hand.
swipes:
&カード名,Necromancer
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Add two random monster cards (other than "Necromancer") from your Graveyard to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn; when one of your monsters is destroyed: Add that monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

&カード名,Necromancer
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned: Add two random monster cards (excluding "Necromancer" monsters) from your Graveyard to your hand.\n[2]. Once per turn; when a monster you control is destroyed: Add that monster from your Graveyard to your hand.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,ハヤテ
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが場に出たとき手札から魔法カード１枚を捨てて発動できる。デッキから「ハヤテ」以外のレベル４以下ハンタータイプモンスターをランダムに１体特殊召喚する。\n[2].このカードが場に出たとき以外に、風属性カードの効果が発動したときに発動する。自分フィールド上のランダムなハンタータイプのモンスター１体の攻撃力を100ポイントアップする。\n

When a Wind Attribute card's effect is activated, except when this card is Summoned; increase the attack power of one random Hunter Type monster on your field by 100 points.\n

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:

mes:
&カード名,海の狩人
&効果テキスト,[1].１ターンに３度まで、相手フィールド上のモンスターを選択し、手札を１枚捨てて発動できる。そのモンスターに400ポイントのダメージを与える。\n[2].このカードが相手モンスターを破壊したとき発動する。LPを800回復する。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Sea Hunter
&効果テキスト,[1]. Up to three times per turn; select one monster on the opponent's field and discard one card from your hand to activate this effect: Deal 400 points of damage to that monster.\n[2]. When this card destroys an opponent's monster: Recover 800 LP.
swipes:
&カード名,Sea Hunter
&効果テキスト,[1]. Up to three times per turn; select one monster on the opponent's field and discard one card from your hand to activate this effect: Deal 400 points of damage to that monster.\n[2]. When this card destroys an opponent's monster: Recover 800 LP.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,先駆け兵士
&効果テキスト,[1]自分フィールド上にこのカード以外のモンスターが存在しない場合、このカードが召喚に成功した時発動する。カードを１枚ドローする。このとき、ドローしたカードが効果を持たない戦士タイプモンスターだった場合、そのモンスターを自分フィールド上に特殊召喚する。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Vanguard Soldier
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is successfully summoned; if no other monsters exist on your field, activate this effect: Draw one card. If the drawn card is a non-effect Warrior Type monster; Special Summon that monster to your field.
swipes:
&カード名,Vanguard Soldier
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is successfully summoned; if no other monsters exist on your field, activate this effect: Draw one card. If the drawn card is a non-effect Warrior Type monster; Special Summon that monster to your field.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,ドラゴニックシャーマン
&効果テキスト,[1].このカードが場に出たとき発動する。自分フィールド上のすべてのモンスターをドラゴンタイプにする。\n[2].このカードが場に存在する限り、自分フィールド上のドラゴンタイプモンスターが与える戦闘ダメージは200ポイントアップする。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Dragonic Shaman
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned; change all monsters on your field to Dragon Type.\n[2]. As long as this card remains on the field; increase the battle damage dealt by Dragon Type monsters on your field by 200 points.
swipes:
&カード名,Dragonic Shaman
&効果テキスト,[1]. When this card is Summoned; change all monsters on your field to Dragon Type.\n[2]. As long as this card remains on the field; increase the battle damage dealt by Dragon Type monsters on your field by 200 points.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,竜を狩るもの
&効果テキスト,[1].フィールド上にドラゴンタイプのモンスターがいる場合、このカードの召喚コストは１つ少なくなる。\n[2].このカードの通常召喚に成功したとき、フィールド上のドラゴンタイプモンスター１体を選択して発動する。そのモンスターに1000ポイントのダメージを与える。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Dragon Hunter
&効果テキスト,[1]. If there is a Dragon Type monster on the field; the summoning cost for this card is reduced by one.\n[2]. When this card is successfully Normal Summoned; select one Dragon Type monster on the field and deal 1000 points of damage to it.
swipes:
&カード名,Dragon Hunter
&効果テキスト,[1]. If there is a Dragon Type monster on the field; the summoning cost for this card is reduced by one.\n[2]. When this card is successfully Normal Summoned; select one Dragon Type monster on the field and deal 1000 points of damage to it.

name: Gira
mes:
&カード名,従僕少年
&効果テキスト,特性：「挑発」\nこのカード名の効果は１ターンに1度までしか発動できない。\n[1].手札にこのカードが存在し、自分フィールド上にレベル5以上のモンスターが存在する場合に発動できる。このカードを自分フィールド上に特殊召喚する。

name: Japanese Translation helper
mes:
&カード名,Servant Boy
&効果テキスト, Trait: [Taunt]\nThe effects of cards with this card's name can only be activated once per turn.\n[1]. When this card is in your hand and you control a Level 5 or higher monster; Special Summon this card to your field.
swipes:
&カード名,Servant Boy
&効果テキスト, Trait: [Taunt]\nThe effects of cards with this card's name can only be activated once per turn.\n[1]. When this card is in your hand and you control a Level 5 or higher monster; Special Summon this card to your field.
